About.heading: ¿Who are we?
About.title: About
About.subTitle: Every line of code is an opportunity to create something better.
About.text: Front-End Developer with over 6 years of experience designing and building responsive, scalable web applications. Proficient in modern technologies such as React.js, Next.js, GraphQL, and Node.js with a focus on performance, accessibility, and user experience. Experienced working in agile and remote environments, with strong collaboration, adaptability, and problem-solving skills. Passionate about clean code, innovation, and continuous improvement
